Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negagtive bacteria:Escherichia coli DC2 (MIC=9 µM), Escherichia coli K12 (MIC=80 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus mprF (presence of carbonate) (MIC=0.35-0.7 µM), S. aureus mprF (absence of carbonate) (MIC=6 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activiy against Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: Structure, dynamics, and antimicrobial and immune modulatory activities of human LL-23 and its single-residue variants mutated on the basis of homologous primate cathelicidins.
Literature.Author: Wang G, Elliott M, Cogen AL, Ezell EL, Gallo RL, Hancock RE.
